statements: SELECT * FROM hydropower_reservoirs ORDER BY reservoir_id DESC;
SELECT reservoir_name, water_level FROM hydropower_reservoirs WHERE water_level > 1000;
SELECT reservoir_id, reservoir_name FROM hydropower_reservoirs WHERE electricity_production > 5000;
SELECT * FROM hydropower_reservoirs WHERE electricity_production < 10000 ORDER BY water_level ASC;
SELECT reservoir_name, electricity_production FROM hydropower_reservoirs WHERE water_level BETWEEN 800 AND 1200;
SELECT * FROM hydropower_reservoirs WHERE water_level > 5000 ORDER BY reservoir_name ASC
SELECT reservoir_name, electricity_production FROM hydropower_reservoirs WHERE electricity_production < 100000 ORDER BY electricity_production DESC
SELECT reservoir_name, water_level, electricity_production FROM hydropower_reservoirs WHERE water_level < 8000 AND electricity_production > 50000
SELECT reservoir_name, water_level FROM hydropower_reservoirs WHERE reservoir_id BETWEEN 100 AND 200 ORDER BY reservoir_name ASC
SELECT * FROM hydropower_reservoirs WHERE water_level BETWEEN 3000 AND 7000 AND electricity_production BETWEEN 40000 AND 80000 ORDER BY electricity_production DESC
SELECT * FROM water_flow_levels ORDER BY date_time DESC;
SELECT hydropower_reservoir_id, water_level FROM water_flow_levels WHERE water_level > 50;
SELECT hydropower_reservoir_id, water_level, date_time FROM water_flow_levels WHERE hydropower_reservoir_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM electricity_production ORDER BY electricity_output ASC;
SELECT hydropower_reservoir_id, electricity_output FROM electricity_production WHERE date_time >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM water_flow_levels
SELECT water_level, date_time FROM water_flow_levels WHERE hydropower_reservoir_id = 1 ORDER BY date_time DESC
SELECT SUM(water_level) AS total_water_level FROM water_flow_levels GROUP BY hydropower_reservoir_id
SELECT * FROM electricity_production JOIN water_flow_levels ON electricity_production.hydropower_reservoir_id = water_flow_levels.hydropower_reservoir_id
SELECT electricity_output, date_time FROM electricity_production WHERE date_time >= '2022-01-01' AND electricity_output > 100 ORDER BY electricity_output DESC
SELECT * FROM WaterFlowLevels;
SELECT reservoir_id, water_level FROM WaterFlowLevels ORDER BY water_level DESC;
SELECT reservoir_name, location FROM Reservoirs WHERE location='River' ORDER BY reservoir_name;
SELECT DISTINCT reservoir_id FROM ProductionOptimization;
SELECT reservoir_id, timestamp, electricity_production FROM ProductionOptimization WHERE electricity_production > 500 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM WaterFlowLevels WHERE reservoir_id = 1 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT reservoir_name, location FROM Reservoirs WHERE location LIKE '%river%' ORDER BY reservoir_name ASC;
SELECT reservoir_id, timestamp, water_level FROM WaterFlowLevels WHERE water_level > 500 ORDER BY water_level DESC, timestamp ASC;

SELECT p.reservoir_id, p.timestamp, p.electricity_production, r.reservoir_name FROM ProductionOptimization p JOIN Reservoirs r ON p.reservoir_id = r.reservoir_id WHERE p.electricity_production > 1000 ORDER BY p.timestamp ASC;

SELECT DISTINCT w.reservoir_id, w.timestamp, w.water_level, r.reservoir_name FROM WaterFlowLevels w JOIN Reservoirs r ON w.reservoir_id = r.reservoir_id WHERE r.location = 'Lake District' ORDER BY w.timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM HydropowerReservoir;
SELECT reservoir_name, water_level FROM HydropowerReservoir WHERE reservoir_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM ElectricityProduction ORDER BY production_date DESC;
SELECT reservoir_name, electricity_output FROM HydropowerReservoir INNER JOIN ElectricityProduction ON HydropowerReservoir.reservoir_id = ElectricityProduction.reservoir_id;
SELECT maintenance_date, maintenance_description FROM MaintenanceLogs WHERE reservoir_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM PowerConsumption;
SELECT reservoir_name, water_level FROM HydropowerReservoir WHERE water_level > 50;
SELECT reservoir_name, maintenance_description FROM HydropowerReservoir JOIN MaintenanceLogs ON HydropowerReservoir.reservoir_id = MaintenanceLogs.reservoir_id;
SELECT production_date, electricity_output FROM ElectricityProduction WHERE production_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY electricity_output DESC;
SELECT * FROM HydropowerReservoir WHERE reservoir_id IN (SELECT reservoir_id FROM ElectricityProduction WHERE electricity_output > 500);
SELECT * FROM HydropowerReservoirs;
SELECT reservoir_name, capacity FROM HydropowerReservoirs WHERE capacity > 1000;
SELECT id, maintenance_date, maintenance_description FROM MaintenanceLogs ORDER BY maintenance_date DESC;
SELECT total_production, production_date FROM ElectricityProduction WHERE production_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-28';
SELECT reservoir_name, water_flow_level, capacity FROM HydropowerReservoirs WHERE water_flow_level < 50;
SELECT reservoir_name, capacity FROM HydropowerReservoirs ORDER BY capacity DESC, reservoir_name ASC LIMIT 5
SELECT * FROM ElectricityProduction WHERE total_production > 1000 AND production_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY production_date DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT reservoir_name, water_flow_level FROM HydropowerReservoirs WHERE water_flow_level BETWEEN 50 AND 100 ORDER BY water_flow_level DESC LIMIT 5

SELECT reservoir_name, maintenance_date, maintenance_description FROM HydropowerReservoirs JOIN MaintenanceLogs ON HydropowerReservoirs.id = MaintenanceLogs.reservoir_id WHERE maintenance_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY maintenance_date DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT r.reservoir_name, d.safety_rating FROM HydropowerReservoirs r JOIN DamSafety d ON r.id = d.reservoir_id WHERE d.safety_rating = 'High' ORDER BY r.reservoir_name ASC LIMIT 5
